fullText: This Oklahoma! is a thrilling reinvention that makes Rodgers and Hammerstein's 1943 musical feel urgent and contemporary while honoring its enduring emotional truths.
dtliExcerpt: This Oklahoma! is a thrilling reinvention that makes Rodgers and Hammerstein's 1943 musical feel urgent and contemporary while honoring its enduring emotional truths.
bwwExcerpt: There's no denying the abundant pleasures to be had from a sumptuous large-scale revival of a classic American musical with a top-flight cast. But a bold reimagining of a familiar work from the canon can deliver an altogether different and far more startling thrill, bringing out unexpected textures ...
